00001 // AT90USB/usb_drv.h
00002 // Macros for access to USB registers of Atmels AT90USB microcontrollers
00003 // This file contains low level register stuff as described in
00004 // Atmels AT90USB datasheet 7593D-AVR-07/06
00005 // S. Salewski 21-MAR-2007
00006 // B. Sauter (modified for usb host stack) 2007
00007 
00008 
00009 // A few macros for bit fiddling
00010 #define SetBit(adr, bit)                        (adr |=  (1<<bit))
00011 #define ClearBit(adr, bit)                      (adr &= ~(1<<bit))
00012 #define BitIsSet(adr, bit)                      (adr & (1<<bit))
00013 #define BitIsClear(adr, bit)                    (!(adr & (1<<bit)))
00014 
00015 
00016 
00017 // PLL clock for USB interface, section 6.11, page 50
00018 // PLLCSR (PLL Control and Status Register)
00019 // set PLL prescaler according to XTAL crystal frequency
00020 //#define UsbXTALFrequencyIs2MHz()              PLLCSR = (PLLCSR & ~(15<<1))
00021 //#define UsbXTALFrequencyIs4MHz()              PLLCSR = (PLLCSR & ~(15<<1)) | (1<<2)
00022 //#define UsbXTALFrequencyIs6MHz()              PLLCSR = (PLLCSR & ~(15<<1)) | (2<<2)
00023 //#define UsbXTALFrequencyIs8MHz()              PLLCSR = (PLLCSR & ~(15<<1)) | (3<<2)
00024 //#define UsbXTALFrequencyIs12MHz()             PLLCSR = (PLLCSR & ~(15<<1)) | (4<<2)
00025 //#define UsbXTALFrequencyIs16MHz()             PLLCSR = (PLLCSR & ~(15<<1)) | (5<<2)
00026 #if (F_CPU == 2000000)
00027 #define _pre_ 0
00028 #elif (F_CPU == 4000000)
00029 #define _pre_ 1
00030 #elif (F_CPU == 6000000)
00031 #define _pre_ 2
00032 #elif (F_CPU == 8000000)
00033 #define _pre_ 3
00034 #elif (F_CPU == 12000000)
00035 #define _pre_ 4
00036 #elif (F_CPU == 16000000)
00037 #define _pre_ 5
00038 #else
00039   #error "XTAL-Frequency has to be 2, 4, 6, 8, 12 or 16 MHz for USB devices!"
00040 #endif
00041 #define UsbSetPLL_CPU_Frequency()              PLLCSR = (_pre_<<2)
00042 #define UsbEnablePLL()                          SetBit(PLLCSR, PLLE)
00043 #define UsbDisablePLL()                         ClearBit(PLLCSR, PLLE)
00044 #define UsbIsPLL_Locked()                       BitIsSet(PLLCSR, PLOCK)
00045 #define UsbWaitPLL_Locked()                     while (!(PLLCSR & (1<<PLOCK)));
00046 #define UsbEnableClock()                        ClearBit(USBCON, FRZCLK)
00047 
00048 //USB general registers, section 21.12.1, page 263 of datasheet
00049 // UHWCON (UsbHardWareCONfiguration)
00050 #define UsbSetDeviceMode()                SetBit(UHWCON, UIMOD)           // select host or device mode manually
00051 #define UsbSetHostMode()                  ClearBit(UHWCON, UIMOD)
00052 #define UsbEnableUID_ModeSelection()      SetBit(UHWCON, UIDE)            // enable mode selection by UID pin
00053 #define UsbDisableUID_ModeSelection()     ClearBit(UHWCON, UIDE)
00054 #define UsbEnableUVCON_PinControl()       SetBit(UHWCON, UVCONE)          // enable UVCON pin control, figure 21-7
00055 #define UsbDisableUVCON_PinControl()      ClearBit(UHWCON, UVCONE)
00056 #define UsbEnablePadsRegulator()          SetBit(UHWCON, UVREGE)          // USB pads (D+, D-) supply
00057 #define UsbDisablePadsRegulator()         ClearBit(UHWCON, UVREGE)
00058 
00059 // USBCON (USB CONfiguration)
00060 #define UsbEnableController()             SetBit(USBCON, USBE)            // USB controller enable
00061 #define UsbDisableController()            ClearBit(USBCON, USBE)          // reset and disable controller
00062 #define UsbIsControllerEnabled()          BitIsSet(USBCON, USBE)
00063 #define UsbSetHostModeReg()               SetBit(USBCON, HOST)            // select multiplexed controller registers
00064 #define UsbSetDeviceModeReg()             ClearBit(USBCON, HOST)          //
00065 #define UsbFreezeClock()                  SetBit(USBCON, FRZCLK)          // reduce power consumption
00066 #define UsbEnableClock()                  ClearBit(USBCON, FRZCLK)
00067 #define UsbIsClockFreezed()               BitIsSet(USBCON, FRZCLK)
00068 #define UsbEnableOTG_Pad()                SetBit(USBCON, OTGPADE)         // ??? is this the UID pad?
00069 #define UsbDisableOTG_Pad()               ClearBit(USBCON, OTGPADE)
00070 #define UsbEnableID_TransitionInt()       SetBit(USBCON, IDTE)            // enable ID transition interrupt generation
00071 #define UsbDisableID_TransitionInt()      ClearBit(USBCON, IDTE)
00072 #define UsbEnableVBUS_TransitionInt()     SetBit(USBCON, VBUSTE)          // enable VBUS transition interrupt
00073 #define UsbDisableVBUS_TransitionInt()    ClearBit(USBCON, VBUSTE)
00074 
00075 // USBSTA (USBSTAtus, read only)
00076 #define UsbIsFullSpeedMode()              BitIsSet(USBSTA, SPEED)         // set by hardware if controller is in fullspeed mode,
00077 #define UsbIsLowSpeedMode()               BitIsClear(USBSTA, SPEED)       // use in host mode only, indeterminate in device mode
00078 #define UsbIsUID_PinHigh()                BitIsSet(USBSTA, ID)            // query UID pad/pin
00079 #define UsbIsVBUS_PinHigh()               BitIsSet(USBSTA, VBUS)          // query VBUS pad/pin
00080 
00081 // USBINT (USBINTerrupt)
00082 #define UsbIsIDTI_FlagSet()               BitIsSet(USBINT, IDTI)          // set by hardware if ID pin transition detected
00083 #define UsbClearIDTI_Flag()               ClearBit(USBINT, IDTI)          // shall be cleared by software
00084 #define UsbIsVBUSTI_FlagSet()             BitIsSet(USBINT, VBUSTI)        // set by hardware if transition on VBUS pad is detected
00085 #define UsbClearVBUSTI_Flag()             ClearBit(USBINT, VBUSTI)        // shall be cleared by software
00086
